app.pages.home.seccionPrincipal.label.ti: We apply technology to make your business grow.
app.pages.home.seccionPrincipal.label.su: Increase the effectiveness of your business, creating solutions with scalable technology to facilitate the operation, which translates into more sales, optimization of processes and costs.
app.pages.home.seccionPrincipal.label.de: We are a proudly Mexican company, dedicated to consulting specialized in the development of comprehensive solutions in the cloud.
Our goal is to make available to our business partners strategies and tools to enhance / strengthen their sales by making the best use of technology, using the power of electronic commerce.
app.pages.home.seccionServices.label.car: We implement your online store with the best eCommerce practices.
You will have the support of our team 365 days a year.
We study your business and with your help we design the project together.
You will be able to charge in the clear within your store, with all the payment methods that you accept.
We create a uniform design with your corporate identity, unique for you.
Expand your team strategically. We assign specialized talent to your business on demand and instantly.
We solve your talent attraction needs in an efficient and timely manner.
“In the technological and digital world there is no black and white, only the ability to identify the ideal platforms and tools for your business”

app.pages.work-with-us.label.legend: Join the team! You can also send your CV to talento@vinneren.com.mx
app.pages.clients.case1: Largest B2B case of VTEX and Vinneren worldwide. Closed B2B, with more than 20,000 clients, prices and inventories in real time, various delivery methods. Development of several custom components both in front end and back end.
app.pages.clients.case2: From Grupo Modelo, it is a convenience store specializing in beer and craft beer for a social experience on any occasion. Launch of the 1st. On Demand site for Grupo Modelo, VTEX and Vinneren, in 2 countries Mexico Modelorama Now and Paraguay estacion.com.py. We also made the middleware connection with the logistics system, scalable for all the countries of the project and double challenge implementation of account validation.
app.pages.clients.case3: Various developments including seeking to improve the user experience. Among them, the CheckOut redesign, inventory disaggregation, dedicated resource cell, development of Elektra credit integration, among many others, stand out.
app.pages.clients.case4: Launch of its online store, which was also the first store launched in IO technology in Mexico. This store has been followed by the launch in other countries such as the USA, Colombia, Peru and soon Chile. We recently also redesigned the new mobile version
app.pages.clients.case5: For 135 years, La Marina has been with your style! and since then, they have offered the best experiences for their customers from their Department stores and their online store, managing to offer unique, unrepeatable and omnichannel experiences. An example of this is the 2-hour delivery that you can make by buying from its website or also its Gift Table experience... Without a doubt, La Marina has and will continue to bet on strengthening its online experience for the most demanding consumers in the region.
app.pages.clients.case6: Regional communication and D2C strategy for the most representative brands in CPG issues, such as: Saba Intimawear, Tena, Tork, Jobst in countries such as Mexico, Brazil, Costa Rica, Chile, etc. The objective of Essity is to communicate through educational content, the problems but above all, how they can support them to be much more 'bearable' with their products.
